Posts.Content: bookhog wrote: Am I crazy for thinking about taking a vacation two weeks after mastectomy, assuming my drain comes out this week? Especially if it delays my chemo (but no more than a week?) Flying is involved. Half my family wants to go, the other half is horrified. Thoughts?
